Name: Team Size Lower Bound
Description: Ensure at least 3 members per team

Name: Team Size Upper Bound
Description: Limit to maximum 9 members per team

Name: Budget Cap
Description: Total budget must not exceed allocated amount

Name: Sprint Duration Lower
Description: Each sprint must be at least 1 week long

Name: Sprint Duration Upper
Description: Each sprint must not exceed 4 weeks

Name: Required Skill Coverage
Description: Must include at least one Product Owner per project

Name: Max Parallel Sprints
Description: No more than 3 concurrent sprints per project

Name: Epic Effort Upper
Description: An epicâ€™s estimated effort must not exceed capacity

Name: Backlog Size Limit
Description: Product Backlog entries not to exceed 200 items
